lead_paragraph: Russia faces being kicked out of the Paralympics in Rio de Janeiro in the latest disciplinary action by a sports body infuriated at growing evidence about the country's state-sponsored doping program.

headline.print_headline: Russia Slammed by Paralympic Leaders, Faces Rio Doping Ban
headline.main: Russia Slammed by Paralympic Leaders, Faces Rio Doping Ban

snippet: Russia faces being kicked out of the Paralympics in Rio de Janeiro in the latest disciplinary action by a sports body infuriated at growing evidence about the country's state-sponsored doping program....
